channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: LG’s Aussie Black Friday sale slashes up to AU$3,800 off its superb OLED TVs when you bundle a soundbar
item.description: LG Australia's Black Friday sale is now live and it's throwing out some incredible offers on top-rated OLED TVs and soundbar bundles.

item.title: The Paperwhite at a record-low price is my top Black Friday Kindle deal – but there's another ereader I'd recommend
item.description: The standard 16GB edition of the Kindle Paperwhite has been given its biggest discount yet for Black Friday – a generous 23% off, dropping the price to AU$229 – but there is an alternative that offers better value.

item.title: Monarch Tractor preps for layoffs and warns employees it may ‘shut down’
item.description: The memo that went out Thursday, which TechCrunch obtained, says the "timing" of the company's pivot away from tractor manufacturing puts it at risk.

item.title: What is the release date for Maxton Hall season 2 episode 5 on Prime Video?
item.description: Ruby and James are on the brink of being forced apart ahead of Maxton Hall season 2 episode 5, but when can we see the fallout?

item.title: Squid Game: The Challenge season 2's finale was a big let-down – Netflix should end the games for good
item.description: The original Squid Game series is done, so why are we dragging out this concept?

item.title: Trump Takes Aim at State AI Laws in Draft Executive Order
item.description: The draft order, obtained by WIRED, instructs the US Justice Department to sue states that pass laws regulating AI.
